## What is this?

Google Antigravity is the first "Agent-first" IDE, powered by Gemini 3. It changes how we code, moving from writing syntax to orchestrating agents.

**Awesome Antigravity** is a community-driven project to document the best configurations, prompts, and workflows to help you master this new tool without burning through your rate limits.

## Why use the Website?

While this repo serves as an index, our website [**awesome-antigravity.com**](https://www.google.com/url?sa=E&source=gmail&q=https://awesome-antigravity.com/ "null") offers:

1. â€‹**Search & Filter**â€‹: Instantly find prompts for Python, JS, Go, etc.
2. â€‹**One-Click Copy**â€‹: Don't struggle with selecting text; get the JSON/Prompt instantly.
3. â€‹**Visual Previews**â€‹: See what the Agent output looks like before you try.
4. â€‹**Dark Mode**â€‹: Obviously.
